Locale.Value:
1. 转文字频道，会记权益包转写时长免费升级，从 20h/月升级为 30h/月，加量不加价；
2. 转文字频道，免费用户实时转写时长不足时，新增支持继续预览转写结果，体验更好。

1. In the transcription channel, the free upgrade of transcription duration for the accounting rights package has been increased from 20 hours per month to 30 hours per month, with an increase in quantity without any price increase.
2. In the transcription channel, when the real-time transcription duration of free users is insufficient, a new feature has been added to support continuous preview of the transcription results, providing a better experience.
